name: ContDiff.euclidean_dist
initialProofState:
F : Type u_2
instâœâ´ : NormedAddCommGroup F
instâœÂ³ : NormedSpace Real F
G : Type u_3
instâœÂ² : NormedAddCommGroup G
instâœÂ¹ : NormedSpace Real G
instâœ : FiniteDimensional Real G
f g : F â†’ G

h : âˆ€ (x : F), Ne (f x) (g x)
âŠ¢ ContDiff Real â†‘n fun x => Euclidean.dist (f x) (g x)
decl:
theorem ContDiff.euclidean_dist (hf : ContDiff â„ n f) (hg : ContDiff â„ n g) (h : âˆ€ x, f x â‰  g x) :
    ContDiff â„ n fun x => Euclidean.dist (f x) (g x) := by
  simp only [Euclidean.dist]
  apply ContDiff.dist â„
  exacts [(toEuclidean (E := G)).contDiff.comp hf,
    (toEuclidean (E := G)).contDiff.comp hg, fun x => toEuclidean.injective.ne (h x)]
